thread.title: Pineapple pizza debate turns into an all out internet battle (5 Photos)
thread.title_full: Pineapple pizza debate turns into an all out internet battle (5 Photos)

author: Mac
title: Pineapple pizza debate turns into an all out internet battle (5 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
Should pineapple go on pizza? It’s the oldest debate in the history of pizza, and recently turned into an all out trash war. All because of the above meme. 
The internet took immediate action the only way they know how; a snarky back and forth photoshop battle… 2 4 5 
We know damn well the pineapple on pizza debate can be a deal breaker. Let us know in the comments which side you’re on. Advertisement
